mapper.select: SELECT vu.viewing_user_isattend AS viewingUserIsAttend, v.viewing_at AS viewingAt, v.viewing_title AS viewingTitle, vu.viewing_user_deposit AS viewingUserDeposit, r.restaurant_location AS restaurantLocation, v.viewing_code AS viewingCode, r.restaurant_code AS restaurantCode FROM viewing_user vu JOIN viewing v ON v.viewing_code = vu.viewing_code JOIN restaurant r ON r.restaurant_code=v.restaurant_code WHERE vu.user_code = #{userCode} ORDER BY v.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM viewing_user vu JOIN viewing v ON v.viewing_code = vu.viewing_code JOIN restaurant r ON r.restaurant_code=v.restaurant_code WHERE vu.user_code = #{userCode}
